name: Tanjir Ahmed
desc: A timeless beauty. The watch is a wonderful sight on my wife's wrist. I bought it as a birthday/ vacation gift and it was a very wise thing to do. The pink/goldtone is splendid for beachware and restaurants as well. It seems to go with most things in her wardrobe. Last but not least, it keeps perfect time!

name: Offial Hasnat
desc: Love the watch, fast delivery. Very happy! Will buy again. The selection was amazing and I noted it so that when I'm looking for something out of the ordinary I can find it at a great price. Great selection of watches. I ordered a basic Timex with a rose/gold face and light gray strap. It is very catching and timeless.

name: Luois Charls
desc: Good service I got what I ordered. I ordered a G-Shock watch. I was kept apprized of the shipping and delivery date via email. I received the watch carefully packed. I'm very happy with my purchase as soon as I learn how to use the watches features. Fast delivery. Very happy! Will buy again.

name: Eftekhar Alom
desc: Great selection of watches!. The watch is a wonderful sight on my wife's wrist. I bought it as a birthday/ vacation gift and it was a very wise thing to do. The pink/goldtone is splendid for beachware and restaurants as well. It seems to go with most things in her wardrobe. Last but not least, it keeps perfect time!

name: Mahbub Buiya
desc: 5 Star service. I love the watches, fast delivery. Very happy! Will buy again. The selection was amazing and I noted it so that when I'm looking for something out of the ordinary I can find it at a great price. I ordered a basic Timex with a rose/gold face and light gray strap. It is very catching and timeless.

name: Md Monnam
desc: Very efficient - quick delivery - item just as described. Couldn't ask for more. I ordered a G-Shock watch. I was kept apprized of the shipping and delivery date via email. I received the watch carefully packed. I'm very happy with my purchase as soon as I learn how to use the watches features.
